mapper.sql: APPLYINST_PROJ_ID applyinstProjId, APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime
mapper.select: select ap.APPLYINST_PROJ_ID applyinstProjId, ap.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, ap.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, ap.CREATER creater, ap.CREATE_TIME createTime, proj.LOCAL_CODE localCode, proj.PROJ_NAME projName, proj.GCBM gcbm, proj.CENTRAL_CODE centralCode, proj.BUILD_AREA_SUM buildAreaSum, proj.PROJ_ADDR projAddr, proj.ABOVE_FLOOR aboveFloor from AEA_APPLYINST_PROJ ap,AEA_PROJ_INFO proj where ap.PROJ_INFO_ID = proj.PROJ_INFO_ID and ap.APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId}
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_APPLYINST_PROJ (APPLYINST_PROJ_ID, APPLYINST_ID, PROJ_INFO_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME) values (#{applyinstProjId}, #{applyinstId}, #{projInfoId}, #{creater}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update AEA_APPLYINST_PROJ
APPLYINST_PROJ_ID = #{applyinstProjId},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
where APPLYINST_PROJ_ID = #{applyinstProjId}
